photosynthesis: Tsarin da tsire-tsire ke amfani da hasken rana, ruwa, da CO2 don samar da abinci (glucose)
numfashin salula: Tsarin da sel ke karya glucose don sakin makamashi
mitochondria: Organelles a cikin sel masu alhakin numfashin salula
chlorophyll: Green pigment a cikin tsire-tsire masu ɗaukar hasken rana don photosynthesis
dna: Deoxyribonucleic acid, kwayoyin da ke dauke da bayanan kwayoyin halitta
rna: Ribonucleic acid, kwayoyin da ke da hannu a cikin haɗin furotin
furotin: Molecule wanda ya ƙunshi amino acid, yana yin ayyuka daban-daban na jiki
enzyme: Protein wanda ke hanzarta halayen sinadarai a cikin jiki
tantanin halitta: Asalin naúrar rayuwa, tushen ginin duk wani abu mai rai
nama: Rukunin sel masu kama da juna suna aiki tare don yin takamaiman aiki
gaba: Ƙungiyar kyallen takarda suna aiki tare don yin takamaiman aiki
tsarin gabobin: Ƙungiyar gabobin da ke aiki tare don yin aiki mai rikitarwa
homeostasis: Iyawar kwayoyin halitta don kula da ingantaccen yanayi na ciki
daidaitawa: Canji a cikin kwayoyin halitta wanda ke taimaka mata tsira da haifuwa a cikin muhallinta
juyin halitta: Tsarin da yawan halittu ke canzawa akan lokaci
zabin yanayi: Tsarin da kwayoyin halitta masu halaye suka fi dacewa da yanayin su zasu iya rayuwa da kuma haifuwa
ilimin halitta: Nazarin yadda kwayoyin halitta suke hulɗa da juna da muhallinsu
yanayin muhalli: Al'ummar rayayyun halittu da muhallinsu marasa rai suna mu'amala da juna
biosphere: Sashe na Duniya mai tallafawa rayuwa
haraji: Reshen ilmin halitta wanda ya shafi rarraba kwayoyin halitta
ilimin halittar jiki: Reshen ilimin halitta wanda ya shafi nazarin tsari da tsari
ilimin lissafi: Reshen ilimin halitta wanda ya shafi nazarin ayyuka da matakai a cikin halittu masu rai
autotroph: Halittar da za ta iya samar da abincinta ta amfani da haske ko sinadarai (misali, tsire-tsire)
heterotroph: Kwayoyin da ke samun abinci ta hanyar cinye wasu kwayoyin halitta (misali, dabbobi)
furodusa: Halin da ke samar da kwayoyin halitta (misali, tsire-tsire)
mabukaci: Halin da ke cinye kwayoyin halitta da wasu kwayoyin halitta suka samar (misali, dabbobi)
mai bazuwa: Kwayoyin da ke karya matattun kwayoyin halitta da kwayoyin halitta (misali fungi, kwayoyin cuta)
yawan jama'a: Rukunin halittu masu nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'in nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'i nau'in halitta).
al'umma: Ƙungiyar jama'a daban-daban suna hulɗa da juna a wani yanki na musamman
biome: Tsarin yanayi mai girma tare da dabi'un shuke-shuke da dabbobi (misali, hamada, daji)
bambancin halittu: Daban-daban na rayuwa a duniya a kowane mataki, daga kwayoyin halitta zuwa halittu
mai hatsari: Nau'in da ke cikin haɗarin bacewa
